transcript.text: all right Shalom Shalom guys so mail in
who's a new member of our prayer team
zoom prayer team she emigrated from
Taiwan back in 1980 and she's lived in
Los Angeles for the last several years
she's in her late 60's but a fierce
warrior for Messiah she she met with me
later this afternoon after I had done
some preaching and and then she took me
out to lunch she brought me took me to a
taco shop near UCLA and we spent hours
in fellowship talked about a lot of
things one thing that was brought to my
mind which I haven't shared it's a
personal testimony when I was 18 I
applied to the USC film school of
writing because I wanted to be a
screenwriter and you know USC which was
founded by Steven Spielberg they get
hundreds of thousands of applicants for
their screenwriting school but they only
accept 40 freshmen well I was one of 40
freshmen that was accepted into the USC
film writing school and when you
graduate from the school you're
guaranteed a job in Hollywood well my
dad they'd given me a $10,000
scholarship but my dad wanted them to
give me a 30,000 a year scholarship so I
wouldn't go into debt so my dad said no
I couldn't go and I told my dad then I
said well you must know more than I do
and I remember my English teacher was so
angry with my dad because she was like
do you realize what type of opportunity
you're not allowing your son to do and
now I realize now I realize that yah was
protecting me from the Satanic
pedophilia going on in Hollywood I just
want to give that as a testimony to
honor my dad hallelujah hallelujah our
parents know what's best for us when
we're little so if you're a little child
or if you're a teenager that's watching
my videos make sure you honor your
parents as the Torah says hallelujah I
got beautiful here at campus we got some
beautiful I have almost 19th century
lamp posts here
it's kind of dark so it's hard to see
here anyway Mei Lin and I just spent a
lot of time in fellowship that she's
gonna be at the prayer meeting again
tonight and it was a beautiful time we
discussed a lot of great things and she
also talked about that there's child sex
trafficking going on and tunnels beneath

front of that museum and doing a YouTube

information documents and other
youtubers who've exposed the child sex
trafficking at the getty museum so we'll
see what happens with that but anyway it
was a good it was a good time here at
UCLA today I think that I this this did
not get on film I wish it had but I you
know I had this major confrontation with
this one guy who was critical of my
preaching and and then it turns out he
had the sin in his life and he claimed
to love Jesus and it just it just
continues to be a theme here that the
reason there's so much sin and it's a
microcosm in the United States the
reason there's so much sin is not

it's because the Christians are living
in sin and they're asleep that's that's
what's going on the church is layered I
see into the core and so sin is
flourishing and it's just a microcosm of

covered by his blood go with his word
we're gonna continue to press on I think

so hallelujah the fight goes on the
truth marches on hallelujah
yeah bless everyone Shalom Shalom
